T02D1510:285a-1: l'u yi pa aa bhi sa ma ya bri tti t'i k'a bi she sha dyo ta n'a ma /
T02D1510:285a-3: l'u yi ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i t'i k'a khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba /
T02D1510:285a-4: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1510:285a-5: dga' ba bzhi yi rnam dag pas //
T02D1510:285a-6: gang zhig zhal bzhi par gsal //
T02D1510:285a-7: nyi ma zla ba me dag pa //
T02D1510:285a-8: gang gis 'di la spyan gsum ldan //
T02D1510:285a-9: bcu gnyis sa yi dag pa ni //
T02D1510:285a-10: de yi grangs can phyag gi phreng //
T02D1510:285a-11: nam mkha' du ba lta bu'i sku //
T02D1510:285a-12: byams pa'i dag pa nyid kyis gsal //
T02D1510:285a-13: bden pa gnyis kyi dag pas ni //
T02D1510:285a-14: brkyang bskum gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1510:285a-15: he ru ka dpal de nyid la //
T02D1510:285a-16: bdag nyid rab tu gus btud nas //
T02D1510:285a-18: tshigs bcad byas pa'i mngon rtogs kyi //
T02D1510:285a-19: khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba'i //
T02D1510:285a-20: t'i k'a bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D1510:285a-21: de la thams cad kyi dang por phyag rgya chen
T02D1510:285b-0: po la 'dun pas @285b gtor ma'i las byas nas
T02D1510:285b-1: ci bya zhen // dang por ri sbyil la sogs
T02D1510:285b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod de sogs pa'i
T02D1510:285b-5: khang stong la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D1510:285b-7: shr'i yig gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1510:285b-8: he zhes rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1510:285b-9: ru yig rtog tshogs bral ba ste //
T02D1510:285b-10: ka zhes gang du'ang mi gnas so //
T02D1510:285b-11: zhes bya ba yi ge bzhi'i don la mngon du phyogs shing //
T02D1510:285b-12: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyis shr'i he ru ko& ham /
T02D1510:285b-13: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1510:285b-14: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab ma la 'khyud pa phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1510:285b-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i sdom par bdag nyid mos par bya'o //
T02D1510:285b-16: a'a li k'a li la sogs pa ni /
T02D1510:285b-17: thog mar aom yig tha mar h'um h'um phat kyi
T02D1510:285b-18: yi ge can gyi a'a li k'a li'i phreng ba
T02D1510:285b-19: las 'od zer kha dog lnga pa 'phros shing /
T02D1510:285b-20: g-yon skor gyis lte ba'i phyogs su lan gsum yongs su bskor bar gnas pa las /
T02D1510:285b-21: 'khor lo gsum gyi lha tshogs spros pas bgegs kyi tshogs brlag par bsam /
T02D1510:285b-22: de nas tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi zhes pa ni /
T02D1510:285b-23: byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms rnams te /
T02D1510:285b-24: de la sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i brtse ba nyid ni byams par gsungs ;
T02D1510:285b-25: sdug bsngal gsum ldan 'jig rten la //
T02D1510:285b-27: rang gi bsod nams gzhan phan la //
T02D1510:285b-28: rangs pa'i sems nyid dga' ba ste //
T02D1510:285b-29: chags dang sdang ba dang bral bas //
T02D1510:285b-30: thams cad don byed btang snyoms so //
T02D1510:285b-31: 'di yi dgos pa 'chad de rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi dri ma nyams pa'i phyir //
T02D1510:285b-32: he ru ka'i don snyoms pas stong pa nyid du mos pa'o //
T02D1510:285b-33: sdom par mos pa ni lus thams cad kyi bya ba'i rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1510:285b-34: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas grub pa'i rang
T02D1510:285b-35: bzhin du yongs su dag pa'i he ru ka'i tshul
T02D1510:285b-36: nyid kyang shugs kyis bstan no ;
T02D1510:285b-37: / a'a li k'a li sgom pa ni gsung gi dag pa'o //
T02D1510:285b-38: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel ba'o //
T02D1510:285b-39: da ni rnam par dag pa'i phung po la sogs pa las //
T02D1510:285b-40: kun nas bslang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pha ni
T02D1510:285b-41: byang chub myur du thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D1510:286a-1: gzugs la rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1510:286a-2: de la gzugs kyi phung po ni /
T02D1510:286a-3: dbang po lnga yul lnga rnam par rig byed ma
T02D1510:286a-4: yin pa ste gzugs su rung ba yin pa'i phyir
T02D1510:286a-6: 'dir gzugs kyi phung po skye ba'i sa bon gyi rten yin pas ;
T02D1510:286a-7: gzugs kyi gnas gtso bo mgo'i dbus der bhr'um dkar po'o //
T02D1510:286a-8: tshor ba'i phung po ni bde ba dang //
T02D1510:286a-9: sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin /
T02D1510:286a-10: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshor
T02D1510:286a-11: ba gsum yang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin te
T02D1510:286a-12: / dbang po drug po la brten pas 'di rnams bco brgyad du 'gyur te /
T02D1510:286a-13: 'di yang drod la brten pa 'di'i gnas kyi gtso bo lte ba ste de la aom ser po'o //
T02D1510:286a-14: 'du shes kyi phung po ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa /
T02D1510:286a-15: khams bco brgyad kyi khyad par 'dzin pa'i sgo nas
T02D1510:286a-16: ming gi sbyor ba rnams kyis sems las byung ba
T02D1510:286a-17: gang skyes pa de rnams 'du shes so //
T02D1510:286a-18: de yang mtha' yas pa yin te yul mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1510:286a-19: mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams kyi phal cher
T02D1510:286a-20: rtsa bar gyur pa mgrin pa yin pas der hr'i:
T02D1510:286a-21: dmar po'o // rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1510:286a-22: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa lnga dang ;
T02D1510:286a-24: yid dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang /
T02D1510:286a-25: rnam par shes pa brgyad do //
T02D1510:286a-26: 'di la rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rtsa
T02D1510:286a-27: bar gyur pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang
T02D1510:286a-28: / yid kyi dbang po'i rten srog rlung yin pas
T02D1510:286a-29: de'i gnas ni snying ga ste de la h'um dkar
T02D1510:286a-30: / po'o // bzhi po rnams las gzhan 'du byed
T02D1510:286a-31: kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni sems las byung
T02D1510:286a-32: / po'o // ba rnams te / de yang ma rig pa the tshom log par lta ba /
T02D1510:286a-33: 'jig tshogs su lta ba mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D1510:286a-34: lta ba la mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1510:286a-36: brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D1510:286a-37: 'dod chags nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna khong khro la sogs mang pa'o //
T02D1510:286a-38: de'i khongs su chud pa'i sems byung rnams kyi yang rten rlung ste /
T02D1510:286a-39: de'i gnas rkang pa gnyis kyi khrong mo'i 'og yin te /
T02D1510:286a-40: de dag la gzugs brnyan ltar gnyis su gyur pa'i ho: ljang gu'o//
T02D1510:286b-0: @286b phung po lnga po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la spyi gtsug hr'i: mthing ga'o //
T02D1510:286b-1: de bzhin du mig la sogs par byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis bon aom dkar po dang /
T02D1510:286b-2: h'um mthing ga / tram ser po /
T02D1510:286b-5: h'um dkar po lte ba la sogs par ltung byed ma la sogs pa'i lam ser po /
T02D1510:286b-6: mam mthing ga / pam dmar mo /
T02D1510:286b-8: bam dung mdog bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1510:286b-9: rgyud gzhan las drangs pa'i mtshan la sogs par tshigs su bcad pas bsnyad pa /
T02D1510:286b-10: rnam snang rin chen 'byung gnas te //
T02D1510:286b-11: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02D1510:286b-12: rdo rje sems dang mi bskyod pa //
T02D1510:286b-13: 'di drug rgyal pa'i khyu mchog yin //
T02D1510:286b-14: brkyang bskum spyan gsum ldan pa rnams //
T02D1510:286b-15: dkar ser dmar po ljang gu dang //
T02D1510:286b-16: dkar mthing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
T02D1510:286b-18: g-yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa //
T02D1510:286b-19: gsum po rin chen padma dmar //
T02D1510:286b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje 'phyar bas rol //
T02D1510:286b-21: g-yon rnams dril bu thugs kar bsnams //
T02D1510:286b-22: lnga pa thugs kar phyag g-yas na //
T02D1510:286b-23: rdo rje g-yon pas dril bu dkur //
T02D1510:286b-24: brten pa'o de bzhin g-yon pa gzhan //
T02D1510:286b-25: mi bskyod pa ni phyag g-yas kyis //
T02D1510:286b-26: sa gnon phyag rgyas rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1510:286b-27: sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D1510:286b-28: mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //
T02D1510:286b-29: sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba //
T02D1510:286b-30: kun du bzang po rgyal sras rnams //
T02D1510:286b-31: dkar po mthing gser po dmar //
T02D1510:286b-32: sngon po dkar rnams go rims bzhin //
T02D1510:286b-34: g-yon pas thugs kar dril bu bsnams //
T02D1510:286b-35: phyag rdor thugs kar rdo rje g-yas //
T02D1510:286b-36: g-yon gyi dril bu dkur brten pa //
T02D1510:286b-37: gzhan gsum g-yas pas rin chen dang //
T02D1510:286b-39: g-yon pa dril bu thugs kar bsnams //
T02D1510:286b-40: pad dmar sna tshogs rdo rje 'phyar //
T02D1510:286b-41: drug pa thugs kar rdo rje g-yas //
T02D1510:286b-42: g-yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa'o //
T02D1510:286b-43: rang rang sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D1510:286b-44: thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1510:286b-45: ltung byed ma la sogs pa yang //
T02D1510:286b-46: ser dang mthing nag dmar ljang gu //
T02D1510:286b-47: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa rnams kyis //
T02D1510:287a-1: lo rdo rje pad ral gri //
T02D1510:287a-2: g-yas pa'i gzhan gri gug go //
T02D1510:287a-3: g-yon rnams thod pa kha tv'am ga //
T02D1510:287a-4: lnga pa du ba'i mdog can te //
T02D1510:287a-5: zhal gsum du mdog dkar dang dmar //
T02D1510:287a-6: phyag drug de yi g-yon pa la //
T02D1510:287a-7: thod pa kha tv'am zhags pa 'dzin //
T02D1510:287a-8: g-yas kyis lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo //
T02D1510:287a-9: gri gug rnams ni rim pas 'dzin //
T02D1510:287a-10: gcer bu skra grol lha mo rnams //
T02D1510:287a-11: de dag thams cad spyan gsum pa //
T02D1510:287a-12: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum yang dag gnas //
T02D1510:287a-13: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1510:287a-14: ltung byed ma la sogs rnams ni //
T02D1510:287a-15: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming can te sangs
T02D1510:287a-16: rgyas spyan dang m'a ma k'i gos dkar mo dang
T02D1510:287a-17: sgrol ma chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma'i rang
T02D1510:287a-18: bzhin no // ltung byed mas ni bdud thams cad ltung bar byed pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D1510:287a-19: padma gar gyi dbang phyug ma ni las kha tshar
T02D1510:287a-20: ba thams cad sgrub par byed pas gar nyid ni
T02D1510:287a-21: las kha tshar ba la dbang phyug ste don yod
T02D1510:287a-22: grub pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1510:287a-23: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1510:287a-24: de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang /
T02D1510:287a-27: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D1510:287a-28: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gzhan de bzhin
T02D1510:287a-29: gshegs pa lnga rim pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o
T02D1510:287a-30: // gti mug rnam par nyams pas gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1510:287a-31: gzhan rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02D1510:287a-33: gzugs brnyan la sogs pa ni yang na phung po lnga go rim sa bzhin du gzugs brnyan dang /
T02D1510:287a-34: chu bur smig rgyu chu shing dang sgyu ma bzhin du nges par bya'o //
T02D1510:287a-35: de nas zhes pa ni phung po la sogs pa
T02D1510:287a-36: dag pa'i mjug thogs su bar ma chad par rdo
T02D1510:287a-38: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni nag po /
T02D1510:287a-42: mnyam pa zhes pa ni de dang dus mnyam pa kho na la'o //
T02D1510:287a-43: h'um byung zhes bya ba ni h'um yig las byung ba dang /
T02D1510:287a-44: h'um yig gis mtshan pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1510:287a-45: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes pa'i sngags brjod nas so //
T02D1510:287a-46: 'og khyab ni sa 'og gi mtha'i bar du'o //
T02D1510:287a-47: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um zhes pa'i
T02D1510:287a-48: sngags kyis rdo rje rtse lnga'i rang bzhin rtsig pa
T02D1510:287b-1: aom badzra shar dz'a la tr'am sham tr'am zhes pa 'dis mda'i dra ba yang ngo //
T02D1510:287b-2: aom badzra panydza ra h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1510:287b-3: 'og ces pa ni rdo rje'i gur gyi 'og tu
T02D1510:287b-4: aom badzra bi d'a na h'um kham h'um zhes pa'i
T02D1510:287b-5: sngags kyis rdo rje'i bla re bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1510:287b-6: aom badzra dzra l'a na l'a rka h'um h'um h'um
T02D1510:287b-7: zhes pa 'dis rdo rje'i dra ba 'bar ba yang
T02D1510:287b-8: ngo // khva gdong ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1510:287b-11: phag gdong ma yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D1510:287b-12: gsang sngags bzhi zhes pa ni sumbha la sogs pa zhal bzhi pa'i sngags so //
T02D1510:287b-13: gnyis gnyis rang rang phyogs 'od las byung ba zhes
T02D1510:287b-14: pa ni gsang sngags gnyis gnyis kyi 'od zer las
T02D1510:287b-16: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs zhes pa'i sgras ni gshin rje pho nya ma /
T02D1510:287b-19: khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad kyis phyogs mtshams
T02D1510:287b-20: srung ba kho na bzung na gang gis steng dang
T02D1510:287b-22: brjod pa steng dang 'og gi srung ba yang /
T02D1510:287b-23: rgyud 'di la de rnams kho nas byed de /
T02D1510:287b-24: sa 'og tshangs pa'i gnas par zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1510:287b-25: khron par zhes pa ni rtsig pa'i nye bar byung ba la'o //
T02D1510:287b-26: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig gnas //
T02D1510:287b-27: zhes pa ni bgegs rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02D1510:287b-28: thim zhes pa ni khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1510:287b-29: chu la chu zhes pa la sogs pa ni khva
T02D1510:287b-30: gdong ma la sogs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i dus
T02D1510:287b-31: kho nar chu la chu brdabs pas thim pa bzhin
T02D1510:287b-32: du byung ba'o // de'i dus su rdo rje'i rtsig
T02D1510:287b-33: pa la sogs pa yang bu ga med par gcig
T02D1510:287b-35: rnam pa thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnams bgegs dang bral bar lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1510:287b-36: srung ba'i gur la sogs pa'i mjug thogs su ci'i
T02D1510:287b-37: don du 'di la stong pa nyid du sgom zhes
T02D1510:287b-39: gang gi phyir rgyud 'di shes rab chen po dang ldan pa'i dbang gis yin te /
T02D1510:287b-40: shes rab chen po dang ldan pa'i yang stong nyid kho na srung ba'i mchog go //
T02D1510:287b-41: 'o na bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du
T02D1510:287b-42: rdo rje'i phreng ba yang ci'i phyir zhes pa yang
T02D1510:287b-43: ma brjod cig / gang gi tshe kho na bcom
T02D1510:287b-44: ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i tshe kho nar
T02D1510:288a-1: 'khor los yongs su bcad pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1510:288a-2: zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyi btu ba'i cho ga la /
T02D1510:288a-3: re kh'a brgyad brgyad kyis byas pa re'u mig bzhi
T02D1510:288a-4: bcu zhe dgu par 'gyur pa la aa yig thog
T02D1510:288a-5: mar ha yig tha mar gnas pa yi ge bzhi
T02D1510:288a-6: bcu zhe dgu bri bar bya'o //
T02D1510:288a-8: bcu gsum zla tshes thig ler bcas //
T02D1510:288a-9: zhe brgyad pa la lnga pa'i zhabs //
T02D1510:288a-10: zhe gcig pa la bzhi bcu'i gdan //
T02D1510:288a-11: so drug pa la gsum par ldan //
T02D1510:288a-12: zhe brgyad pa la lnga pa'i zhabs //
T02D1510:288a-13: zhe gcig pa la bzhi bcu'i gdan //
T02D1510:288a-14: zhe dgu pa la lnga pa can //
T02D1510:288a-15: zla tshes thig le dang bcas pa ;
T02D1510:288a-16: / de bzhin yi ge gzhan yang ngo //
T02D1510:288a-17: so brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa //
T02D1510:288a-18: zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i sngags //
T02D1510:288a-19: bcu gsum zla tshes thig le can //
T02D1510:288a-20: bcu dgu pa la zhe gsum gdan //
T02D1510:288a-21: dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa //
T02D1510:288a-22: zhe dgu pa la so drug gdan //
T02D1510:288a-23: bcu dgu la sogs yang de bzhin ;
T02D1510:288a-24: / zhe dgu dbyangs yig lnga par bcas //
T02D1510:288a-25: zla tshes thig ler ldan pa'o //
T02D1510:288a-26: zhe dgu la sogs yang de bzhin //
T02D1510:288a-27: so brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa //
T02D1510:288a-28: bzung pas gnyis pa'i sngags yin no //
T02D1510:288a-29: bcu gsum zla tshe thig le can //
T02D1510:288a-30: bcu dgu zhe gsum pa yi gdan //
T02D1510:288a-31: dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa //
T02D1510:288a-32: zhe dgu pa la so drug ldan //
T02D1510:288a-33: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa can //
T02D1510:288a-34: so bdun pa dang zhe gnyis pa //
T02D1510:288a-35: bcu dgu la sogs la de bzhin //
T02D1510:288a-36: zhe dgu pa la lnga pa dang //
T02D1510:288a-37: zla tshes thig ler bcas pa'o //
T02D1510:288a-38: zhe dgu pa sogs yang de bzhin //
T02D1510:288a-39: so brgyad pa dang nyer bdun pa //
T02D1510:288a-40: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'i sngags //
T02D1510:288a-41: bcu gsum zla tshes thig ler ldan //
T02D1510:288a-42: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa blang //
T02D1510:288a-43: so drug zhe gnyis zhe dgu pa //
T02D1510:288a-44: dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yis brgyan //
T02D1510:288a-45: bzhi bcu bcu dgu so dgu pa //
T02D1510:288a-46: gnyis pa zla tshes thig ler ldan //
T02D1510:288a-47: so dgu nyer bzhi zhe gsum gdan //
T02D1510:288a-48: zhe dgu pa la lnga pa dang //
T02D1510:288a-49: zla tshes thig ler ldan pa ste //
T02D1510:288a-50: zhe dgu la sogs yang de bzhin //

T02D1510:289a-6: dbyangs yig bcu drug gi sa bon las byung ba

T02D1510:289a-9: rnams so // // 'dod chags zhe sdang gtu mug gi / bdag gi lus ngag yid sgo nas //

T02D1510:295a-11: de'i rjes su phag mo la sogs pa'i lha nyid kyi rnam par mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1510:295a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1510:295a-13: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang sa bcu gnas la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1510:295a-14: de la gtsang ba bde ba rtag pa bdag gi log shes bzhi'i gnyen po nyid ni /
T02D1510:295a-15: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste /
T02D1510:295a-16: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
T02D1510:295a-17: gzugs kyi phung po'i yongs su shes pa la rab tu gzhol pa'o //
T02D1510:295a-18: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
T02D1510:295a-19: tshor ba'i phung po yongs su shes pa la gzhol ba'o //
T02D1510:295a-20: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
T02D1510:295a-21: 'du shes dang 'du byed dag sgyu ma lta bur nges par gzung ngo //
T02D1510:295a-22: sems rjes su dran par nye bar gzhag pa ni
T02D1510:295a-23: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin so sor
T02D1510:295a-24: byed pa'o ; / de la dran pa ni nyams
T02D1510:295a-25: su myong ba'i dngos po la sems mi rmugs pa'o
T02D1510:295a-26: byed pa'o ; // de nye bar gnas par byed
T02D1510:295a-27: pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ni dran pa nye
T02D1510:295a-28: byed pa'o ; // bar gzhag pa'o // 'byung ba 'dus pa ni lus so //
T02D1510:295a-29: bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
T02D1510:295a-30: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni chos so //
T02D1510:295a-31: so sor snang ba tsam ni sems so //
T02D1510:295a-32: 'di rnams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis rjes
T02D1510:295a-33: su dran pa nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
T02D1510:295a-34: pa'o // rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1510:295a-35: de'i yan lag rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
T02D1510:295a-36: de la dam pa'i chos thos pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1510:295a-37: mngon par zhen pa shin tu dang ba ni 'dun
T02D1510:295a-39: brtson 'grus la rgyun ma chad par goms pa ni brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T02D1510:295a-40: shin tu rnam par dpyod pa ni dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o //
T02D1510:295b-0: byang chub nyid ni mngon sum du byed pa la khyad @295b par du 'phags pa ni /
T02D1510:295b-1: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T02D1510:295b-2: yang na spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa dben pa 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02D1510:295b-3: 'gog pa rnams la brten pa dang rnam par bral
T02D1510:295b-4: ba yongs su gyur pa lhag par mos pa'i bsam
T02D1510:295b-5: pa ni 'dun pa ste de la bden pa dang
T02D1510:295b-6: ni lam mo // nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs
T02D1510:295b-7: pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ste mya ngan las
T02D1510:295b-8: ni lam mo // 'das pa'o // zag pa dang
T02D1510:295b-9: bcas pa'i dngos po'i sbyor ba dang bral ba ni
T02D1510:295b-11: 'di rnams la brten pa ni dben pa dang 'dod
T02D1510:295b-12: chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa la brten pa'o
T02D1510:295b-14: // rnam par bral ba ni 'dus byas pa'i dngos
T02D1510:295b-15: po thams cad kyi sbyor ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D1510:295b-16: de yongs su gyur pa ni de'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
T02D1510:295b-17: de bzhin du brtson 'grus sems dpyod pa rnams so //
T02D1510:295b-18: 'di la shes pas dbang byed pa'i phyir mig la
T02D1510:295b-19: sogs pa bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa yang
T02D1510:295b-20: dbang po ste / de la bden pa dang dkon
T02D1510:295b-21: mchog dang las 'bras rnams la mngon par yid ches
T02D1510:295b-22: pa ni dad pa ste dbang po'o //
T02D1510:295b-23: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni nges par bya ba nyid kyis nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1510:295b-24: dran pa'i dbang po ni mi rmugs pa'i dran pa nyid kyis ma rig pa'i skabs med pa'o //
T02D1510:295b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni sems rtse gcig pa la dbang phyug pa nyid do //
T02D1510:295b-26: shes rab kyi dbang po ni spang bya dang blad
T02D1510:295b-27: bya dag la de nyid du nges par gzung ba'o
T02D1510:295b-28: // yang na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1510:295b-29: pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sems rab tu
T02D1510:295b-31: sems mngon par spro ba ni brtson 'grus so ;
T02D1510:295b-32: / dad pa'i dbang po la brten pa'i chos rnams gang gis nye bar sogs par byed pa ni /
T02D1510:295b-34: brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos bskyed pa'i don la mi rmugs pa ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D1510:295b-35: dran pa'i dbang po las don ma nyams pa rnams
T02D1510:295b-36: gang gis mngon du phyogs par byed pa de ting
T02D1510:295b-38: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byas
T02D1510:295b-39: pa'i don rnams kyis rnam par 'byed pa de shes
T02D1510:295b-41: ma dang pa le lo rab tu rmugs pa dang
T02D1510:295b-42: bag med pa dang rnam par g-yang pa la sogs
T02D1510:296a-1: mthar thug pa'i dbang po rnams kho na stobs dag ste /
T02D1510:296a-2: dad pa'i stobs brtson 'grus kyi stobs dran pa'i stobs
T02D1510:296a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang shes rab kyi stobs
T02D1510:296a-4: zhes bya'o // rang nyid kho nas yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag byang chub ste /
T02D1510:296a-5: som nyi dang bral ba'i sems so ;
T02D1510:296a-6: / de'i rgyu ni yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1510:296a-7: yan lag bdun te de la sems can kun gyi
T02D1510:296a-9: yang dag pa'i byang chub la smon lam dad thos
T02D1510:296a-10: pa dang rtog pa khong du chud pa la mi
T02D1510:296a-11: rmugs pa ni ngan pa yang dag byang chub kyi
T02D1510:296a-12: yan lag go // chos can bdag la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1510:296a-13: chos kyi phung po lnga la sogs pa kho na yod pa zhes //
T02D1510:296a-14: gang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa de ni
T02D1510:296a-15: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang
T02D1510:296a-17: yid chos nyid dang ro gcig pa na dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D1510:296a-18: dga' ba mi mthun pa bdag dang bdag gi ba'i bag chags bcad pa'i phyir /
T02D1510:296a-19: lus ngag yid gsum las su rung ba nyid ni
T02D1510:296a-20: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
T02D1510:296a-21: lag go // tshad med pa bzhi ni de bzhin
T02D1510:296a-22: nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang stong pa nyid
T02D1510:296a-23: lag go // dang / chos kyi dbyings rnams la
T02D1510:296a-24: rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang
T02D1510:296a-26: so so skye bo'i sa las nges par 'byung ba ni /
T02D1510:296a-27: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D1510:296a-28: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa dang ma gyur
T02D1510:296a-29: pa nyid kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'du byed
T02D1510:296a-30: rnams kyi 'bad rtsol med pa'i rgyud dang btang snyoms
T02D1510:296a-31: mi byed pa dag ni btang snyoms yang dag byang
T02D1510:296a-33: sdig pa kho na'i rjes su mthun pa nyon mongs
T02D1510:296a-34: pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1510:296a-35: / 'phags pa yang yin la yan lag brgyad pa
T02D1510:296a-36: yang yin pas 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa ste
T02D1510:296a-37: / / shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba bsgom pa'i
T02D1510:296a-38: ched du tshol bas lam 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad
T02D1510:296a-39: kyang yin la lam yang yin pas 'phags pa'i lam
T02D1510:296a-41: de'i yan lag rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs brgyad de /
T02D1510:296a-42: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos thams
T02D1510:296a-43: cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can dang 'jig rten
T02D1510:296b-1: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni spang bya dang /
T02D1510:296b-2: blang bya nye bar len pa dag gis spang ba dang //
T02D1510:296b-3: mngon sum du bya bar yid la byed pa'o //
T02D1510:296b-4: dge ba'i sems dpa' zhig gis sems can mi slu
T02D1510:296b-5: bar byed pa'i dag ni yang dag pa'i dag go
T02D1510:296b-6: // dge ba bcu las mi 'da' bar bya ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
T02D1510:296b-7: sems can la tshul chos pa ma yin pa la
T02D1510:296b-8: sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho ba ni yang dag pa'i
T02D1510:296b-9: 'tsho ba'o // rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum
T02D1510:296b-10: tshogs pa'i rjes su 'brel pa lus ngag yid kyi
T02D1510:296b-11: las ni yang dag pa'i stsol ba'o //
T02D1510:296b-12: ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i chos nyid ma rmugs pa nyid ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
T02D1510:296b-13: dpal he ru ka'i tshul du dmigs pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1510:296b-14: 'di rnams kyis sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams so //
T02D1510:296b-15: de la sgrib pa rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D1510:296b-16: snyom las la sogs pa'i nye bar nyon mongs pa rnams so //
T02D1510:296b-17: gang gi phyir 'di rnams spangs na yang dag par
T02D1510:296b-18: spong ba de'i phyir tha mar rgyas par bshad do
T02D1510:296b-19: // yang na thams cad du 'di rnams nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
T02D1510:296b-20: tha mar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun par bshad de /
T02D1510:296b-21: ji srid rnal 'byor pa he ru kar ma gyur
T02D1510:296b-22: pa de srid du 'di rnams kho nas rtag tu
T02D1510:296b-23: spyod do zhes shes par bya ba'i don du'o //
T02D1510:296b-24: yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin yang 'grel bar gsal lo //
T02D1510:296b-25: sa bcu'i rnam par dag pas gnas la sogs pa bcur brjod par bya'o //
T02D1510:296b-26: de la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa ni rim pas /
T02D1510:296b-27: rab dga' dri med 'od byed pa //
T02D1510:296b-29: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
T02D1510:296b-30: legs pa'i blo gros chos sprin ni //
T02D1510:296b-31: p'u dz'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di la man ngag ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1510:296b-32: p'um dz'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1510:296b-33: thig le dang bcas pa bltas shing p'um yig la
T02D1510:296b-34: sogs pa'i yi ge yongs su gyur pa rtsibs med
T02D1510:296b-35: pa'i 'khor lo'i rnam pa gnas la sogs pa'i gnas
T02D1510:296b-36: rnams mgo nas brtsams te skad cig tu blta bar
T02D1510:297a-0: bya'o // de gnas la sogs pa rnams la de dang de'i gnas kyi rtsa @297a * //
T02D1510:297a-1: rnams ni de dang de'i lha nyid kyi tshul du
T02D1510:297a-2: yongs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1510:297a-3: // rna ba zhes pa ni rna ba'i bu ga'i nang du'o //
T02D1510:297a-4: de bzhin lte ba mtshan ma bshang lam smin ma'i dbus mig sna rnams la yang go bar bya'o //
T02D1510:297a-5: ji ltar phyi rol du gnas la sogs pa'i nye
T02D1510:297a-6: bar gnas pa'i chu bo rnams kyi chab kyis gnas
T02D1510:297a-7: la sogs pa gso bar byed pa de bzhin du
T02D1510:297a-8: lus la yang rtsa rnams kyi sen mo la sogs
T02D1510:297a-9: pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir phyi dang mnyam pa nyid
T02D1510:297a-10: do // phyi rol du rdo rje'i gnas ni byang chub chen po'i ming can gyi gnas dang /
T02D1510:297a-12: lus la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i gnas te /
T02D1510:297a-13: dbu ma ni nee ranydza na'o //
T02D1510:297a-14: 'di ltar tshangs pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo brtan par mos par bya'o //
T02D1510:297a-15: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar gsungs
T02D1510:297a-16: pa kho na'i mjug bsdu ba yin te de la
T02D1510:297a-17: mtho ris la sogs pa rnams dang dbyir mi phyed
T02D1510:297a-19: sku gsung thugs dang mtho ris mi yul sa 'og
T02D1510:297a-20: ces bya ba nad dang phyi dang rang bzhin gcig
T02D1510:297a-21: tu 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1510:297a-22: sa bon brjod de yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin
T02D1510:297a-23: las zhes bya ni yi ge gsum las n'a da
T02D1510:297a-24: yongs su gyur pa'i sgo nas gang h'um rang gi
T02D1510:297a-25: ngo bo bskyed pa de de bzhin no //
T02D1510:297a-26: rgyu de las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1510:297a-27: skad cig la sogs pa ni phyag mtshan la sogs
T02D1510:297a-28: pa la ma ltos par lha mo dang lhan cig
T02D1510:297a-30: skad cig phyag rgya zhes pa ni /
T02D1510:297a-31: rang dang dus mnyam pa kho nar shes rab dang sbyor ba'o//
T02D1510:297a-32: skad cig dkyil 'khor lo zhes pa ni /
T02D1510:297a-33: gzhal yas khang dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
T02D1510:297a-34: phyug ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dus skad cig
T02D1510:297a-36: skad cig gis ni gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni
T02D1510:297a-37: bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du aom a'a:zhes bya ba
T02D1510:297a-38: la sogs pa'i sngags brjod do ;
T02D1510:297a-39: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdor bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ste /
T02D1510:297a-40: de nas ni de ma thag tu ye shes kyi
T02D1510:297a-41: 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms te 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1510:297a-42: cho ga ste / ci byas nas she na /
T02D1510:297a-43: de la gsungs pa cho ga gnyis shes nas so //
T02D1510:297b-0: go cha gnyis kyis lha rnams @297b dang lag pa'i mchod pa dang khyad par med do //
T02D1510:297b-1: pags pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rdul phra rab de
T02D1510:297b-2: sngags kyi rang bzhin nam lha'i rang bzhin du blta
T02D1510:297b-3: bar bya'o // myur zhugs zhes bya ba ni aargha la sogs pa la ma ltos par ro //
T02D1510:297b-4: go cha gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1510:297b-5: snying gar nyi gnas zhes pa ni thugs kyi nyi
T02D1510:297b-6: ma'i dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang
T02D1510:297b-7: bzhin h'um yig bsgoms nas de'i 'od zer rnams kyis
T02D1510:297b-8: bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' la pi wang 'dzin
T02D1510:297b-9: pa la sogs pa sngar gsungs pa'i lha mo bcu
T02D1510:297b-10: drug gis mchod nas 'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1510:297b-11: pa des dam tshig gi 'khor lo rab tu gzhug
T02D1510:297b-12: go // de nas de'i rjes su rdo rje rnal
T02D1510:297b-13: 'byor ma rnams kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang
T02D1510:297b-14: ba'i thod pa dang da ma ru 'dzin pa snying
T02D1510:297b-15: ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i pi wang ma la
T02D1510:297b-16: sogs lha mo bcu drug gis mchod nas cung zad
T02D1510:297b-17: gzhol bar byas pa'i thod pa'i bdud rtsis bdag nyid
T02D1510:297b-19: de'i dus su yang shin tu bde ba chen po'i
T02D1510:297b-20: rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsam par bya ste lhag
T02D1510:297b-21: ma go sla'o // de'i rjes su ye shes lnga'i
T02D1510:297b-22: rang bzhin sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du blta
T02D1510:297b-23: ma go sla'o // bar bya ste / de la
T02D1510:297b-24: gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pas nyon mongs
T02D1510:297b-25: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par spangs nas
T02D1510:297b-26: sgro 'dogs thams cad kyi spros pa'i rlung spangs pas
T02D1510:297b-27: dri ma med pa'i snang gsal rlung gis ma bskyod
T02D1510:297b-28: pa'i rgyun bzhin du shin tu 'od gsal ba'i ye
T02D1510:297b-29: shes kyi sgron ma me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D1510:297b-30: ma go sla'o // bar bya ste / kyi ming
T02D1510:297b-31: can // don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa
T02D1510:297b-32: rang nye bar sbyor ba'i ye shes rab tu gsal
T02D1510:297b-33: ma go sla'o // bar bya ste / kyi ming
T02D1510:297b-34: can // ba / 'khor ba gnas pa'i bar du
T02D1510:297b-35: rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D1510:297b-36: tshul gyis rab tu gnas te rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1510:297b-37: yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du don thams cad
T02D1510:297b-38: phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1510:297b-39: des byin gyis brlabs pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D1510:297b-40: ye shes la sogs pa gsum kun rdzob kyi bden
T02D1510:297b-41: pa la dmigs pa'i gzhan don la nges par sbyor
T02D1510:297b-42: ba ste / gang gi dbang thun mong dang khyad
T02D1510:297b-43: par dag gis so sor brtags nas rang rang gi
T02D1510:297b-44: lta ba bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye
T02D1510:298a-1: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos po thams
T02D1510:298a-2: cad la mi rtag pa la sogs pha thun mong
T02D1510:298a-3: gi rnam pas des par spyod do /
T02D1510:298a-4: yul dus gnas skabs kyi sgo nas kyang don gyi
T02D1510:298a-5: bya ba yang thun mong gi nges pas sems par
T02D1510:298a-6: byed do // 'di ltar nges par spyad nas bye brag gi tshul gyis so sor rtog ste /
T02D1510:298a-7: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'am /
T02D1510:298a-8: dad pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mngon du phyogs par
T02D1510:298a-9: 'gyur ba de'i cho kho nar thar pa thob pa'am
T02D1510:298a-10: zhes 'di ltar thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed
T02D1510:298a-12: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang shin tu rnam
T02D1510:298a-13: par dag pas yongs su gyur pas ni me long
T02D1510:298a-14: lta bu'i ye shes su brjod do //
T02D1510:298a-15: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid yongs su gyur pa
T02D1510:298a-16: la bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang bral
T02D1510:298a-17: bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ni mnyam pa
T02D1510:298a-18: nyid kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T02D1510:298a-19: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su gyur pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su brjod do //
T02D1510:298a-20: rab tu 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dbang po
T02D1510:298a-21: las byung ba yongs su gyur pa yang bya ba
T02D1510:298a-23: rten thams cad yongs su gyur pas kyang thub pa'i khyab pa nyid thob po ;
T02D1510:298a-24: /'di la yang sgro 'dogs pa thams cad kyis dben
T02D1510:298a-25: pas shin tu rnam par shes pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D1510:298a-26: la dmigs pas me long lta bu'i ye shes ni
T02D1510:298a-27: chos sku'o // mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog
T02D1510:298a-28: pa'i ye shes dag ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o
T02D1510:298a-29: chos sku'o // // bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02D1510:298a-30: sngon du so sor brtags nas sems can gyi bya ba la gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1510:298a-31: de'i dbang gis gzhan rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1510:298a-32: skye ba la sogs par ston pa yang sems can yongs su smin pa'i ched du ste /
T02D1510:298a-33: mi yin pas kyang 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs
T02D1510:298a-34: pa 'thob ces bya ba nges pa skyed par byed
T02D1510:298a-35: pa'i phyir te / des nye bar bstan pa'i lam
T02D1510:298a-36: yang bsam pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bsgom zhing
T02D1510:298a-38: gzhan rnams kyang de'i lam du 'jug go //
T02D1510:298a-39: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1510:298b-0: ye shes ni zhes pa yang go bar @298b bya'o
T02D1510:298b-1: // khanda ka p'a la zhes pa ni sen mo
T02D1510:298b-2: dang so la sogs pa khanda ka p'a la la
T02D1510:298b-3: sogs pa'i rang bzhin du go bar bya'o //
T02D1510:298b-4: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa mthong na
T02D1510:298b-5: sdom pa nyid du mos pas phyag la sogs pa
T02D1510:298b-6: bya'o zhes bya ba shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1510:298b-7: da ni rnal 'byor chen po brjod par bya ste /
T02D1510:298b-8: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs te /
T02D1510:298b-9: a'a li k'a li gnyis 'od zer lnga dang ldan
T02D1510:298b-10: pa las 'khor lo gsum gyi lha nyid kyi tshogs
T02D1510:298b-11: spros pa brjod cing sna bug g-yas pa'i rlung dang
T02D1510:298b-12: bcas pa 'thon nas 'gro ba 'khor lo gsum gyi
T02D1510:298b-13: rang bzhin du byas te thog ma med pa nas
T02D1510:298b-14: grub pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams ro
T02D1510:298b-16: sna bug g-yon du rab tu zhugs nas lte ba'i
T02D1510:298b-17: dkyil 'khor du rang gi rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan can
T02D1510:298b-18: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa bsams nas /
T02D1510:298b-19: skad cig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um yig bsam par bya'o //
T02D1510:298b-20: de nas zla ba dang sa bon yongs su gyur
T02D1510:298b-21: pas bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dkar po rdo rje
T02D1510:298b-22: dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje
T02D1510:298b-23: dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig
T02D1510:298b-24: ma phag mo dmar po 'khyud pa nam mkha'i ri
T02D1510:298b-25: mo bzhin du bltas la sgyu ma lta bu'i shin
T02D1510:298b-26: tu dga' ba'i sgras kun nas drangs pa'i khams gsum
T02D1510:298b-27: dang dkyil 'khor rang la rim pas bstim par bya'o
T02D1510:298b-28: // rim pa yang srid pa ni snod dang bcud mtha' dag ste dur khrod rnams la'o //
T02D1510:298b-29: dur khrod rnams kyang srung ba'i phyi'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1510:298b-30: srung ba'i 'khor lo sku'i 'khor lo la //
T02D1510:298b-31: sku'i 'khor lo gsung gi 'khor lo la //
T02D1510:298b-32: gsung gi 'khor lo thugs kyi 'khor lo la //
T02D1510:298b-33: thugs kyi 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor
T02D1510:298b-34: te de la thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs su gnas
T02D1510:298b-35: pa rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams la'o
T02D1510:298b-36: // dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa rnams gzugs ma la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T02D1510:298b-37: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal rnams la'o //
T02D1510:298b-38: rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa dag lte ba
T02D1510:298b-39: la gnas pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa
T02D1510:298b-40: dag la rab tu thim par bsam mo //
T02D1510:298b-41: de dag rdo rje phag mo dang sdom pa yang
T02D1510:298b-42: dga' ba mnyam pa'i bde ba chen pos 'dod chags
T02D1510:299a-2: zhu ba de yongs su gyur pa sindh'u ras byugs
T02D1510:299a-3: pa'i mu tig ltar h'um yig bde ba chen po'i
T02D1510:299a-4: rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1510:299a-5: de nas a'u yig ha yig la /
T02D1510:299a-9: thig le n'a da la rim pas rab tu thim pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1510:299a-10: n'a da tsam skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi tshul du lus par blta'o //
T02D1510:299a-11: rab kyis de yang mi dmigs so //
T02D1510:299a-12: yang na lte ba'i padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma
T02D1510:299a-13: dang zla ba kha sbyor ba'i nang na yod pa'i
T02D1510:299a-14: sa bon h'um las byung ba'i padma'i rtsa lag ltar
T02D1510:299a-15: 'od zer gyi ri mo la sems rten par byed
T02D1510:299a-16: pa'i sgo nas / rtsa gnyis la srog rlung gi rgyu ba spangs nas /
T02D1510:299a-17: dbus ma la rab tu 'jug pas gtum mo sbar
T02D1510:299a-18: ba las spyi bo'i zla ba zhu nas 'khor lo
T02D1510:299a-19: la khyab pa'i rim pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1510:299a-20: dbye ba'i khyad par gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1510:299a-21: ba byung nas rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs
T02D1510:299a-22: pas dus gcig tu dkyil 'khor mi dmigs par bya
T02D1510:299a-23: ba'am / rim pas stong pa nyid du bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1510:299a-24: rim pa yang sngar kho na'o //
T02D1510:299a-25: de ltar skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1510:299a-27: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
T02D1510:299a-28: kun du sim nas 'gro ba nyid //
T02D1510:299a-29: de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
T02D1510:299a-30: skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug / ces so //
T02D1510:299a-31: yang dang yang du 'jug pa dang ldang ba rnams
T02D1510:299a-32: kyis kyang bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa rdzogs
T02D1510:299a-33: pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal
T02D1510:299a-34: 'byor mngon sum du byed pa'o zhes bya ba rnal
T02D1510:299a-37: // / de ltar man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1510:299a-38: sgrub thabs bshad nas sgrub thabs 'di kho na bskyed
T02D1510:299a-39: pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed de /
T02D1510:299a-40: de la shin tu rnal 'byor ma'i mtha'i bar ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1510:299a-41: rnal 'byor chen po ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1510:299a-42: bskyed pa dang rdzogs rim 'di gnyis ni /
T02D1510:299a-43: rigs pas sgrubs pa'i yan lag drug pa'i go rims kho nas bsam gtan bya'o //
T02D1510:299a-44: gzhan du na yang dag pa'i sgrub pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1510:299b-0: de bzhin @299b du gsungs pa yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D1510:299b-1: bsnyen dang yan lag drug sbyor bas //
T02D1510:299b-2: grub pa'i mchog ni byas nas su //
T02D1510:299b-3: bsgrub par bya'o gzhan du na //
T02D1510:299b-4: grub pa'i mchog ni mi thob bo //
T02D1510:299b-6: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02D1510:299b-7: srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1510:299b-8: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1510:299b-9: sbyor ba yan lag drug tu 'dod //
T02D1510:299b-10: ces bya ba de la mig la sogs pa'i 'grel
T02D1510:299b-11: ba can rnam par shes pa lnga rnams gzugs la
T02D1510:299b-12: sogs pa'i yul rnams las so sor sdud pa ni
T02D1510:299b-13: bkug nas yang dag par dul bar byed pa gang
T02D1510:299b-15: yang na lha nyid kyi tshul du yul gzung ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
T02D1510:299b-16: bsam gtan so sor sdud pa'i go rims kyis yid
T02D1510:299b-17: kyi rnam par shes pa lha nyid du bsgom pa'o
T02D1510:299b-18: // de yang rnam par rtog pa rnam par dpyod
T02D1510:299b-19: pa dga' ba bde ba sems rtse gcig pa'i dbye
T02D1510:299b-21: de la snod dang bcud kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas
T02D1510:299b-22: pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sdom pa'i yongs su brtag
T02D1510:299b-23: pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
T02D1510:299b-24: de kho na la bstan pa nyid kyis nges pa ni rnam par dpyod pa'o //
T02D1510:299b-25: rnam par dpyod pas de dang de'i lha nyid du dmigs pas yid bde ba de ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1510:299b-26: dga' ba bsgoms pa'i lha la sim pa dang bcas pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni bde ba'o //
T02D1510:299b-27: bde ba dang ldan pa'i sems ting nge 'dzin du
T02D1510:299b-28: gyur pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs pa log pa'i
T02D1510:299b-29: kun rdzob kyi yul can gyis mi shes pa'i skye
T02D1510:299b-30: ba zad pas 'dod pa'i lha kho na la dmigs
T02D1510:299b-31: pa'i sems ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid do zhes
T02D1510:299b-32: bya ba bsam gtan yan lag lnga pa'o //
T02D1510:299b-33: de ltar snga dro'i thun mtshams la ji ltar gsungs
T02D1510:299b-34: pa'i go rims kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsgoms nas
T02D1510:299b-35: ni nyi ma'i gung thun la yang skad cig tu
T02D1510:299b-37: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dmigs nas so sor sdud pa dang /
T02D1510:299b-38: bsam gtan dag gis ji srid du 'dod pa de
T02D1510:299b-39: srid du mngon par phyogs par byed cing bsam gtan
T02D1510:299b-40: bya'o // de'i rjes la thun mtshams kyi dus su
T02D1510:299b-41: dngos su'am mos pas phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas
T02D1510:299b-42: brgyan pa thod pa kha tv'am ga da ma ru
T02D1510:300a-1: pa can gyi brtul zhugs pa'i sgrub pa pos sgrub
T02D1510:300a-2: pa pos dkyil 'khor kho na sgom zhing bskor ba
T02D1510:300a-3: dang za ba la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02D1510:300a-4: yang gsungs pa thun gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1510:300a-5: sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa nas langs te lha'i
T02D1510:300a-7: don 'di kho na la dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud kyi le'u so dgu pa las /
T02D1510:300a-8: he ru ka dpal tshul gyis ni //
T02D1510:300a-9: kha tv'am ga sogs sgom rnams kyis //
T02D1510:300a-10: thod pa g-yon pa'i phyag gis te //
T02D1510:300a-11: brtul zhugs ldan pas spyod pa spyad //
T02D1510:300a-13: khyad par du las kha tshar gyi don du shing
T02D1510:300a-14: sdong la sogs pa btsugs pa na tshul de kho
T02D1510:300a-15: nas gtor ma sbyin pa dang srung ba zhag re
T02D1510:300a-16: re la ba'o zhes pa'i dag gis sgrub thabs kyi
T02D1510:300a-17: bang mdzod ces bya ba'i t'i k'a las kyang gsungs
T02D1510:300a-18: pa / kha tv'am ga sogs sgom rnams kyis //
T02D1510:300a-19: zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i sgras da ma ru'o //
T02D1510:300a-20: chus bran pa la sogs pa ni nye bar mtshon
T02D1510:300a-21: pa tsam ste skor pa dang bza' ba la sogs
T02D1510:300a-22: pa'i las thams cad la tshul 'di ltar bya'o //
T02D1510:300a-23: bye brag tu phyag mtshan gsum pa'i nang nas dam
T02D1510:300a-24: tshig gi dbang gis gang nye bar sbyor ba de
T02D1510:300a-26: 'ga' zhig tu rdo rje dang dril bu yang bzung
T02D1510:300a-27: ste rtag tu 'di gzung gi nges par mi bya'o
T02D1510:300a-28: // de ltar sangs rgyas thod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa /
T02D1510:300a-29: phyag bcu gnyis pa la sogs pa'i dpal sdom pa
T02D1510:300a-30: la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos su bya ba'i
T02D1510:300a-31: go rims kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su chud
T02D1510:300a-32: pa'i sgrub pa dang yongs su mthar thug pa la
T02D1510:300a-33: phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa yang bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1510:300a-34: // 'di yang thod pa 'chang pa'i brtul zhugs ni //
T02D1510:300a-35: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du dbang bskur ba'i dus kho nar sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1510:300a-36: sgrub pa pos 'di kho na mtshan sum cu rtsa
T02D1510:300a-37: gnyis pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
T02D1510:300a-38: la ldang zhes pa 'di la the tshom mi bya'o
T02D1510:300a-39: // 'di la yang snga dro'i thun nas mtshan mo
T02D1510:300a-40: phyed kyi thun gyi bar du lha kho na bsgom
T02D1510:300a-42: de nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1510:300a-43: de la gsung rab las grub pa'i man ngag 'di lta ste /
T02D1510:300a-44: lte ba'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ji
T02D1510:300a-45: ltar gsungs pa'i h'um yig dbus su gnas pa'i a'a
T02D1510:300b-0: li @300b k'a li'i sbyor ba skad cig tu mos
T02D1510:300b-1: nas de dang de'i yi ge dang bcas pa'i 'od
T02D1510:300b-3: 'od zer de'i nge spar 'byed pas bhee ram pa
T02D1510:300b-4: la sogs pa thams cad snod dang bcud kyi dkyil
T02D1510:300b-5: 'khor 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas nas a'a li
T02D1510:300b-6: k'a li'i sbyor ba de kho na la rab tu
T02D1510:300b-7: gzhug par bya'o // yang de bzhin du 'od zer
T02D1510:300b-8: rnam par spros pas 'od zer de'i nges par 'byed
T02D1510:300b-9: pas bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan
T02D1510:300b-10: 'das 'od zer gyi rang bzhin du byas nas yang
T02D1510:300b-11: de kho na bzhin du rab tu 'jug par bya'o
T02D1510:300b-12: gzhug par bya'o // // de kho na bzhin du
T02D1510:300b-13: yang 'od zer rnams spros nas de'i 'od zer gyi
T02D1510:300b-14: nges par 'byed pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor h'um yig
T02D1510:300b-15: dang a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba 'od kyi rang
T02D1510:300b-17: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //
T02D1510:300b-18: kun nas sim par 'gro ba yi //
T02D1510:300b-19: de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
T02D1510:300b-20: skad cig re rer rab tu 'jug / ces 'di
T02D1510:300b-21: ltar 'od gsal mngon du phyogs par byas nas gal
T02D1510:300b-22: te ngal bso ba'i blos nyal bar 'dod na de'i
T02D1510:300b-23: tshe 'di'i dmigs pa kho nas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1510:300b-24: de nas ma bcol pa'i rang bzhin kho nas sgrub
T02D1510:300b-25: po pos 'od gsal gyi rnam par dag pa las
T02D1510:300b-26: / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad
T02D1510:300b-27: cu dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa
T02D1510:300b-28: thod pa kha tv'am ga da ma ru bsnams pa
T02D1510:300b-29: nyid kyis rdo rje thod ldan gyi brtul zhugs 'chad
T02D1510:300b-30: ba kho na zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i dpal bde
T02D1510:300b-31: mchog gi mos pas nyal ba las langs la /
T02D1510:300b-32: snga dro'i thun la sngar bzhin du so sor sdud
T02D1510:300b-33: pa'i rim pas sgrub thabs yan lag dang bcas pa
T02D1510:300b-34: bsgom par bya'o ; /'di bzhin du rim pas dad
T02D1510:300b-35: pa dang bcas pa bar ma chad par yun ring
T02D1510:300b-36: por sgom pa dang ma bral ba'i sgrub pa po
T02D1510:300b-37: la dpal bde mchog la sogs pa mkha' 'gro dang
T02D1510:300b-38: bsgom par bya'o ; / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis
T02D1510:300b-39: rab tu 'bad pas bdag nyid nye bar ston par
T02D1510:300b-40: bsgom par bya'o ; / byed de / 'di yang
T02D1510:300b-41: mngon sum du mthong ba de rnams kyis kyang 'di
T02D1510:300b-42: la rjes su 'dzin to zhes bya ba bskyed pa'i
T02D1510:300b-43: bsgom par bya'o ; / byed de / rim pa'o
T02D1510:300b-44: // srog stsol ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rdzogs
T02D1510:300b-45: pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1510:300b-46: de la rim pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1510:301a-0: bya ba grub pa shin tu rnam par dag @301a * //
T02D1510:301a-1: pa'i chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'i yi shes lnga'i rgyu nyid yin pas /
T02D1510:301a-2: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin me rlung dbang chen chu
T02D1510:301a-3: nam mkha'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas 'byung ba lnga'i
T02D1510:301a-4: bdag nyid can / srog rlung thur du rgyu bar
T02D1510:301a-5: byas nas yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam cig byad chub kyi
T02D1510:301a-6: sems thig le 'gril ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje sna'i
T02D1510:301a-7: rtse mor bab nas gang du gsungs pa'i so sor
T02D1510:301a-8: sdud pa dang yan lag lnga'i bsam gtan gyis rim
T02D1510:301a-10: 'di yang thig le'i sbyor ba ste srog rnams phyi
T02D1510:301a-11: rol du 'gro ba bzlog pa'i don du de bas
T02D1510:301a-12: na de'i rgyu nyid kyis gsang ba 'dus pa bla
T02D1510:301a-13: ma'i rgyud las srog rtsol zhes bya bar brjod do
T02D1510:301a-14: // 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D1510:301a-15: lte bar phra ba'i a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba'am
T02D1510:301a-16: thugs la sogs pa la thig le la sogs pa'i
T02D1510:301a-17: sbyor ba'i bsam gtan gang de yang srog 'thon pa
T02D1510:301a-18: bzlog pa'i don nyid kyis srog rtsol zhes brjod do
T02D1510:301a-19: // bye brag tu bsam gtan 'di lta bu'i stobs
T02D1510:301a-20: kyis ro ma dad brkyang ma dag gis rgyu ba
T02D1510:301a-21: las bzlog nas dbu mar srog rlung gi rtsol ba
T02D1510:301a-22: ni rab tu rgyu ba ste /
T02D1510:301a-23: 'di ltar yang srog rtsol zhes brjod de //
T02D1510:301a-24: de nas thugs kar nyi ma dang dkyil 'khor med
T02D1510:301a-25: pa'i h'um yig rkyang pa bsgoms nas de'i thig le
T02D1510:301a-26: la srog rab tu 'jug pa'i sgo nas gzung ba
T02D1510:301a-27: dang 'dzin pa srog rtsol dang bcas pa nyams na
T02D1510:301a-28: de kho na'i phyir stong pa nyid kho nar gnas
T02D1510:301a-29: pa / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin zhi
T02D1510:301a-30: ba snang dmigs yod pa tsam po sems rin po
T02D1510:301a-31: che nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'od gsal nyid du
T02D1510:301a-32: gyur pa las gang srog rlung brtan par gyur pa
T02D1510:301a-33: pa / de 'dzin pa'o // 'di yang nye bar
T02D1510:301a-34: mtshon pa tsam ste lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa
T02D1510:301a-35: pra pa'i a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba'am /
T02D1510:301a-36: rdo rje'i sna'i rtse mo la bsgoms pa'i thig le'i sbyor ba'am //
T02D1510:301a-37: gtum mo la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gang yang rud ba'am /
T02D1510:301a-38: gsungs ma thag pa'i rim pas gang srog rlung brtan par gyur pa de yang 'dzin pa'o ;

T02D1510:301a-43: cig tu 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis gang
T02D1510:301a-44: gi tshe sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D1510:301b-0: smon @301b lam gyis rab tu 'byed pa'i mthus dang
T02D1510:301b-1: po bsgoms pa'i lha la rjes su dran pa 'byung
T02D1510:301b-2: ba de la yang bsgoms pa'i a'a li k'a li
T02D1510:301b-3: la sogs pa'i phra ba'i sbyor ba las sgom pa
T02D1510:301b-4: pos 'od zer sgros par byas pa 'di ni rjes
T02D1510:301b-5: su dran pa'o // 'od de dang bcas pa ba
T02D1510:301b-6: slu'i bu ga re re rnams kyis phung po khams
T02D1510:301b-7: dang skye mched la sogs pa lha'i rang bzhin spros
T02D1510:301b-8: pa ni rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba ni

T02D1510:301b-11: brtan pa'i rin chen spro bar byed //
T02D1510:301b-12: mi brtan pas na spro mi bya //
T02D1510:301b-13: rab mchog sprin rnams kyis spro bya //
T02D1510:301b-14: sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam 'od kyis //
T02D1510:301b-16: de nas phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs
T02D1510:301b-17: pa rang bzhin gyis spros pa'i dngos po thams cad
T02D1510:301b-18: kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rnams 'od kyi rang bzhin
T02D1510:301b-19: du byas nas 'od zer rnams kyang gsungs pa'i sbyor

T02D1510:301b-21: mi gcig pas bsgoms pa'i gang yang rung ba'i phra
T02D1510:301b-22: ba'i sbyor ba la stod pa dang snying rje dbyer
T02D1510:301b-23: mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin la 'gril pa'i tshul du
T02D1510:301b-24: bsdus nas skad cig gis rang rig pa'i ye shes
T02D1510:301b-26: 'di kho na rgyud gzhan nas 'byung ba dang /

T02D1510:301b-28: 'od gsal las ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi skus
T02D1510:301b-29: zhes pa de yang ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba
T02D1510:301b-31: dpal gsad ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi mar yang gsungs pa /
T02D1510:301b-32: bcu po dbang po rnams kyi ni //
T02D1510:301b-33: rab 'jug gnas pa thams cad du //
T02D1510:301b-34: so sor sdud pa zhes brjod de //
T02D1510:301b-36: 'dod pa lnga rnams bsdus pa yis //
T02D1510:301b-37: sangs rgyas lnga ni rab sbyor bas /
T02D1510:301b-38: brtags pa bsam gtan du brjod de //

T02D1510:301b-40: rnam par rtog dang rnam par dpyod //
T02D1510:301b-41: dga' dang de bzhin bde ba dang //
T02D1510:301b-42: sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dang ni //
T02D1510:301b-43: lnga po 'di rnams bsam gtan bsdus //
T02D1510:301b-44: gsang rgyud sku rnams thams cad la //

T02D1510:301b-46: gsang gsum 'byung ba rtog pa yin //
T02D1510:301b-47: rnam dpyod yongs su de longs spyod //
T02D1510:301b-48: gsum pa yid bde dga' ba ste //
T02D1510:302a-2: / sems kyi lnga pa shes par bya //
T02D1510:302a-3: shes dang shes bya'i skye ba nyams //
T02D1510:302a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad rang bzhin zhi //

T02D1510:302a-6: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02D1510:302a-7: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1510:302a-8: 'gril ba'i tshul gyis phab nas su ;
T02D1510:302a-9: / sna yi rtse mor rab rtog bya //

T02D1510:302a-14: gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad //
T02D1510:302a-15: 'gog pa'i rdo rje gnas sems la //
T02D1510:302a-16: rtags kyi 'byung ba rab tu skyo //
T02D1510:302a-17: de yi rtags kyang rnam pa lnga //
T02D1510:302a-18: byang chub rdo rje las byung ba //
T02D1510:302a-19: dang po smig rgyu'i rnam pa can //

T02D1510:302a-23: lnga brtag tu gsal byed de //
T02D1510:302a-24: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu'o //
T02D1510:302a-25: brtan pa rdo rje'i lam gyis su //

T02D1510:302a-29: rjes su dran zhes shes par bya //

T02D1510:302a-31: shes rab thabs dang snyoms zhugs pas //
T02D1510:302a-32: thams cad dngos po thams cad du //
T02D1510:302a-33: 'gril ba'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni //

T02D1510:302a-35: skad cig yi shes rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1510:302a-36: ting nge 'dzin zhes ming can no //
T02D1510:302a-37: tshig le'ur byas pa 'di rnams las rtogs par dka' ba'i tshig rnam par bshad de /
T02D1510:302a-38: bcu po zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang /
T02D1510:302a-39: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyi'o //
T02D1510:302a-40: de'i phyir 'di kho na gsungs te /
T02D1510:302a-41: dbang po rnams kyi rang 'jug gnas //
T02D1510:302a-43: dbang po rnams ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams so //
T02D1510:302a-44: yang rang 'jug par gnas pa ni rang rang gi
T02D1510:302a-45: yul la 'jug pa ni rab tu 'jug pa ste
T02D1510:302a-46: / rang gi 'jug pa la gnas pa'i phyir rang
T02D1510:302a-47: 'jug gnas pa ni mig la sogs pa'i shes pa
T02D1510:302a-48: lnga zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1510:302a-49: 'di yang bsdus pa so so zhes ba ni //
T02D1510:302b-0: 'dod par byed pa ni @302b mngon par zhen par
T02D1510:302b-1: byed pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs

T02D1510:302b-4: rim pa bzhin du sdud ba ni 'gugs par byed

T02D1510:302b-7: de la so so zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i bsdus pa thob nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1510:302b-8: rang 'jug pa'i gnas gang shes pa lnga de kho
T02D1510:302b-9: na rim gyis rang 'jug pa dang bral zhing so
T02D1510:302b-11: 'dod pa lnga rnams ni yul lnga ste /

T02D1510:302b-15: kyi rab tu sbyor bas yongs su rtogs pa yang

T02D1510:302b-19: byung ba ni gsang gsum dbyung ste /

T02D1510:302b-21: shes dang shes bya'i skye ba nyams //

T02D1510:302b-35: zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs snyoms par

T02D1510:303a-4: skad cig ye shes rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1510:303a-5: zhes bya ba skad cig gis rang rig skye bas

T02D1510:304a-8: rigs dang mthun pa'i h'um las byung //

T02D1510:304b-1: rlung gis n'a da de kho na la rab tu
T02D1510:304b-2: 'jug par bya'o // de bzhin du yang dang yang
T02D1510:304b-3: du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o
T02D1510:304b-4: 'jug par bya'o // // de kho na bzhin du
T02D1510:304b-5: n'a da de kho na las snying po dang nye
T02D1510:304b-6: ba'i snying po'i sngags brjod cing /
T02D1510:304b-7: 'khor lo sdom pa'i lha tshogs spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1510:304b-8: bas sdar bzhin du snying po dang nye ba'i snying
T02D1510:304b-9: po'i sngags bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1510:304b-10: lha so so'i sngags brjod pas /
T02D1510:304b-11: yongs su rdzogs pa la so sor spro pa dang
T02D1510:304b-12: bsdu ba zhes pa ni dam tshig gi bzlas pa'o
T02D1510:304b-13: // chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi nga rgyal
T02D1510:304b-14: gyis phreng ba rang gi khar zhugs nas rdo rje'i
T02D1510:304b-15: lam nas padmar song nas aa ba dh'u t'i'i lam
T02D1510:304b-16: nas gyen du 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal
T02D1510:304b-17: // du 'thon te / rang gi zhal gyi sgo
T02D1510:304b-18: nas de kho na bzhin du bskor bar bsgom zhing
T02D1510:304b-19: phreng ba'i sngags brjod ces pa do li'i bzlas pa'o
T02D1510:304b-20: // du 'thon te / // rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sprul pa dang /
T02D1510:304b-21: bde ba chen po gnyis kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i
T02D1510:304b-22: aa yig dang ham yig gi sa bon gnyis kyi
T02D1510:304b-23: bzlas pa ni rang bzhin gyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1510:304b-24: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i thig le las /
T02D1510:304b-25: sngags kyi phreng ba 'od du 'bar ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa /
T02D1510:304b-26: sems dpa' gnyis kyi zhal nas 'thon nas sems ma
T02D1510:304b-27: gnyis kyi zhal du rab tu zhugs nas thur du
T02D1510:304b-28: sel ba'i rlung gis thur gyi rim pas rang dang
T02D1510:304b-29: phyag rgya la mu tig gi phreng ba bzhin du
T02D1510:304b-30: bskor bar bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ye shes
T02D1510:304b-31: kyi bzlas pa'o // phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can
T02D1510:304b-32: gyi lus 'di la sa chu me rlung gi khams
T02D1510:304b-33: kyi bzlas pa'o // kyi rang bzhin / rang bzhin du grub pa drug cu rtsa bzhi ;
T02D1510:304b-34: brgyad cu drug sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa'i 'dab ma can /
T02D1510:304b-35: 'khor lo bzhi'i rnam par bsgoms nas rim pa ji
T02D1510:304b-36: lta ba bzhin du dbyangs yig dang po a'a li
T02D1510:304b-37: k'a lis yongs su bskor ba dang ldan ba h'um
T02D1510:304b-38: yig / bhr'um a'om dzra'im khom l'om m'om p'om t'om
T02D1510:304b-39: zhes pa'i sa bon gyis bskor ba /
T02D1510:304b-40: aom cha gsum pa a'a a'i au ae sa bon gyis bskor ba dang /
T02D1510:304b-41: ham yig la dbyangs yig nyis 'gyur gyi phreng ba yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1510:304b-42: 'khor lo de rnams la rnam par bsams nas sngags
T02D1510:304b-43: kyi yi ge rnams kyang mar me'i rtse mo dangs
T02D1510:305a-0: de las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis @305a * //
T02D1510:305a-1: lus thams cad gsal bar byas nas gnas pa zhes bya ba sngags kyi a'a li'o //
T02D1510:305a-2: 'di la a'a li k'a li sa yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba'i bshad pa 'di yin te /
T02D1510:305a-3: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02D1510:305a-4: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung bzhi bar byed ba dang /
T02D1510:305a-5: dge ba nye bar 'phel bar byed pa me long
T02D1510:305a-6: lta bu'i ngo bo nyid nyis 'gyur dang dbyangs yig
T02D1510:305a-7: bcu drug / de bzhin du sems can ma lus
T02D1510:305a-8: pa'i rgyud la gnas pa'i ma rig pa'i mun pa
T02D1510:305a-9: 'joms par byed pa mi dge ba'i 'dam rdzab skem
T02D1510:305a-10: pa byed cing / byang chub sems kyi myu gu
T02D1510:305a-11: yongs su smin par byed pa dpe byad brgyad cu
T02D1510:305a-13: da dha ya la'i yi ge drug bsnan pas yi
T02D1510:305a-14: ge bzhi bcu gnyis 'gyur gyis yongs su bskor ba'o
T02D1510:305a-15: // sngags la mngon par zhe na pa'i rtog pa
T02D1510:305a-16: dang bcas pas de spong ba'i phyir srub pa dang
T02D1510:305a-17: bsrub pa'i sbyor bas ye shes kyi me las kyi
T02D1510:305a-18: rlung gis bskyod pa lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la du
T02D1510:305a-19: bar 'thul zhing 'bar ba'i rang gi 'od zer rnams
T02D1510:305a-20: kyis aa yig dbye bar byas nas me dang rlung
T02D1510:305a-21: gi sbyor bas sprul pa'i 'khor lo bsregs nas dbu
T02D1510:305a-22: ma'i rtsa nas gyen dbu ma'i rtsa nas gyen du
T02D1510:305a-23: song ste rim gyis chos dang longs spyod bde ba
T02D1510:305a-24: chen po'i 'khor lo rnams kyang mi snang bar byas
T02D1510:305a-25: // nas / rna ba g-yas pa'i ao di ya
T02D1510:305a-26: na'i lam nas 'thon nas phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sems
T02D1510:305a-27: can bsdus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1510:305a-28: gser gyi sgo dz'a landha ra'i ming can spyi gtsug
T02D1510:305a-29: gi bu gar rab tu zhugs nas bde ba chen
T02D1510:305a-31: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du thur du 'ongs pa'i rim pas mi snang bar byas nas /
T02D1510:305a-32: rang gi lte ba'i nam mkha' la thim zhing //
T02D1510:305a-33: skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi tshad du mthong ba ni rgyud kyi a'a li'o //
T02D1510:305a-34: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyi sems stong ba nyid du
T02D1510:305a-35: bsgom pa chad pa'i tshul nyid du 'gyur zhe na
T02D1510:305a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lte ba'i nam
T02D1510:305a-38: mkha' las ye shes kyi me de nyid gyen du
T02D1510:305a-39: srog rlung rgyu ba'i lam las de rnams kyi bde
T02D1510:305a-40: ba chen po'i 'khor lo thob nas de la gnas
T02D1510:305b-0: pa'i ham yig gi @305b ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
T02D1510:305b-1: bzhu nas de rnams kho na'i ao di ya na'i
T02D1510:305b-3: rang nyid kyi dz'a landha ra'i lam la rab tu
T02D1510:305b-4: zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsregs pa
T02D1510:305b-5: rnams kyis kyang dga' bar byed ces gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D1510:305b-6: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas brtsams te ;
T02D1510:305b-7: sprul ba'i 'khor lo'i bar du sngags dang bcas pa'i
T02D1510:305b-8: 'khor lo bzhi la gsos btab nas sngar bzhin du
T02D1510:305b-9: gyen gyi rim pas de kho na'i lam las 'thon
T02D1510:305b-10: nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang lam
T02D1510:305b-11: de kho na nyid nas rab tu zhugs nas 'khor
T02D1510:305b-12: lo bzhi gsos 'debs par byed pa ni ye shes
T02D1510:305b-13: kyi a'a li'o // 'di ltar ye shes kyi skur
T02D1510:305b-14: bsgoms pas rtag pa nyid du 'gyur zhe na de'i
T02D1510:305b-15: skyon yongs su bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1510:305b-16: rnal 'byor pa des kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T02D1510:305b-17: dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin zung 'jug gi ngo bo
T02D1510:305b-18: nyid gsang ba'i a'a li bsgoms par bya ste /
T02D1510:305b-19: rim pa 'dis rdo rje dang padma snyoms par zhugs
T02D1510:305b-20: pas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo zhu ba'i byang
T02D1510:305b-21: chub sems kyi pu ll'i ra m'a la yar dbang
T02D1510:305b-22: du byed pa // dz'a landha rar longs spyod pa
T02D1510:305b-23: ao di ya nar thim pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1510:305b-24: sogs pa'i rim pas gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi re
T02D1510:305b-25: re la yang bsnur ba gsum byas nas /
T02D1510:305b-26: yan lag thams cad la thim pa zhes pa bya
T02D1510:305b-27: ba gsungs pa'i gtso bo nyid kyi phyir yan lag
T02D1510:305b-28: thams cad bsdus pa'i gnas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse
T02D1510:305b-29: mor thig le'i tshul rnam par bsgoms nas rtog pa
T02D1510:305b-30: med pa'i tshul gyis chos nyid la lhan cig skyes
T02D1510:305b-31: pa'i dga' ba'i tshul gyi rnam pa can nyams su
T02D1510:305b-32: myong nas 'gro 'od dang 'bral ba dbang po'i sgo
T02D1510:305b-33: bkag / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral bar
T02D1510:305b-34: gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba gsang ba'i a'a li'o
T02D1510:305b-35: // khrus byed pa'i dus su dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D1510:305b-36: gtor ma'i de nyid brjod pa yom rom las byung ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1510:305b-37: dpal bde mchog gis sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D1510:305b-38: pas zan la sogs pa mdun du bzhag nas dag
T02D1510:305b-39: par bya ste / de la mdun du yom yig las byung ba /
T02D1510:305b-40: rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yom yig las
T02D1510:305b-41: me'i dkyil 'khor de la aom a'a:h'um las byung ba'i
T02D1510:306a-1: las byas pa'i skyed po la aa yig dkar po
T02D1510:306a-2: las byung ba padma'i snod dkar po de la zan
T02D1510:306a-4: aom tram aom kham h'um l'am m'am p'am t'am bam zhes pa'i yi ge las byung ba dang /
T02D1510:306a-5: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud rtsi lnga sgron ma
T02D1510:306a-6: lnga'i tshul du rdzogs par byas nas rlung gis bskyod
T02D1510:306a-7: pa'i me'i drod kyis rab tu bzhu nas sa bon
T02D1510:306a-8: gyi yi ge la sogs pa zhu bar gyur te
T02D1510:306a-9: nyi ma'i mdog can du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1510:306a-10: de nas dngul chu'i kha dog h'um las byung ba /
T02D1510:306a-11: kha thur du bstan pa bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin kha
T02D1510:306a-12: tv'am ga dkar po zhu nas zhu ba de yang
T02D1510:306a-13: dngul chu'i kha dog can bsil bar bltas te /
T02D1510:306a-14: de'i steng du a'a li k'a li yongs su gyur
T02D1510:306a-15: pa las aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum
T02D1510:306a-16: go rims bzhin du steng dang steng du gnas pa
T02D1510:306a-17: las 'khor lo gsum gyi lha dang 'od zer rnams
T02D1510:306a-18: spros te 'gro ba'i don byas nas phyogs bcur gnas
T02D1510:306a-19: pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams
T02D1510:306a-20: dang ; rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1510:306a-21: bdud rtsi blangs nas snyoms par zhugs pa sngon du
T02D1510:306a-22: 'gro bas zhu bar gyur nas so so rang gis
T02D1510:306a-23: bon rnams la rab tu zhugs so //
T02D1510:306a-24: de nas aom yig la sogs pa yang rim pas rab tu thim par blta ste /
T02D1510:306a-25: ji tsam 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge gsum gyi
T02D1510:306a-26: byin gyis brlabs nas 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang de'i
T02D1510:306a-27: sngags dag gis bkug pas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yongs
T02D1510:306a-28: su rdzogs pa mdun du gnas par bya ste //
T02D1510:306a-29: aarga la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod nas /
T02D1510:306a-30: a'a li dang k'a li yongs su gyur pa'i zla
T02D1510:306a-31: ba de nyi ma'i dang bzhin phyag gnyis kyi nang
T02D1510:306a-32: du gnas pa'i h'um yig bltas nas aa n+yo n+ya
T02D1510:306a-33: la sogs pa'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D1510:306a-34: zla ba nyi ma h'um yig yongs su gyur pas
T02D1510:306a-35: rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag gnyis la bdud
T02D1510:306a-36: rtsi'i snod da bzhag nas sam mngon par bsams nas
T02D1510:306a-37: / gtor ma de bdag gis bya ba'i don du lha mo tshad ma la sogs pa bklag cing /
T02D1510:306a-38: de nas mchod bya mchod byed mchod rdzas rnams dbyer
T02D1510:306a-39: med du bltas shing bdud rtsi'i snod de phyogs rnams
T02D1510:306a-40: kyi shar phyogs nas brtsams te g-yon skor du'o //

T02D1510:306b-0: du skor bar byad cing h'um las byung ba'i @306b

T02D1510:306b-12: dang / gdong phyis dang go la la sogs pa

T02D1510:306b-14: dang / phul te / pi wang ma la sogs
T02D1510:306b-16: srid zhi la sogs pa'i bstod pas bstod de ;

T02D1510:306b-18: de nas dur khrod brgyad na gnas pa'i phyogs skyong rnams la /
T02D1510:306b-19: sngar bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams su aom kha la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1510:306b-20: lhag ma dag ni go sla'o //
T02D1510:306b-21: aom badzra he ru ka sa ma ya /
T02D1510:306b-23: he ru ka tve no pa ti shtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D1510:306b-26: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1510:306b-28: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho:/
T02D1510:306b-29: bha ga 'ban badzra he ru ka m'a me munytsa
T02D1510:306b-30: he ru ko bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya
T02D1510:306b-32: ces bya ba yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod do //
T02D1510:306b-33: de nas aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1510:306b-34: zhes brjod cing pad kor gyi phyag rgyas dgyes par bya ste /
T02D1510:306b-35: phyag rgya btul nas mngon par 'khyud pa'i stangs sngon
T02D1510:306b-36: du 'gro ba'i srin lag dang mthe bong gi se
T02D1510:306b-37: gol gtogs nas aom badzra mu:/

T02D1510:306b-41: par byas pa'i lag pa g-yon pa'i ming med kyi

T02D1510:306b-44: par byas pa'i myos par byed pas dkyil 'khor gru
T02D1510:306b-46: de'i dbus su zlum po de la thugs ka'i sa bon las byung ba'am /
T02D1510:307a-0: de'i 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i snod dang bcud kyi dkyil 'khor @307a * //

T02D1510:307a-26: h'um a'a: aom gyi yi ge brjod pa sngon du
T02D1510:307a-27: 'gro bas byugs nas lag pa de la gnas pa'i
T02D1510:307a-28: lha'i 'khor lo yang bdag nyid la rab tu zhugs
T02D1510:307a-30: aom na mo bha ga ba t'i badzra b'a r'a h'i pam /
T02D1510:307a-31: a'arya aa pa r'a dzi ti tree lo kya m'a
T02D1510:307a-32: te ma h'a bi dye shva ri sarba bh'a ta
T02D1510:307a-33: bha y'a pa he ma h'a badzre /
T02D1510:307a-34: badzre sa ni aa dzi te /
T02D1510:307a-35: aa pa r'a dzi te ba shyam ka ri ni no tra bhra ma ni /

T02D1510:307a-49: k'a me shva ri khg ge / tadya th'a /
T02D1510:307a-59: badzra kha tr'am ga / ka p'a la /
T02D1510:307a-61: ma h'a pi shi ta m'am sa shi ro ma nu shy'a ntram pr'a pritta /
T02D1510:307a-62: sam ni dhyam na ra shi ro m'a la gram thi ta nh'a ri ni /
T02D1510:307b-2: sarba p'a pam satva n'am sarba pa shu n'am ma h'a m'am satstshe da ni /

T02D1510:307b-8: sha ta sa ha sra a'a na ni /
T02D1510:307b-9: dzva li ta te dza se /
T02D1510:307b-10: dzva la mu khi bim ga la lo tsa ni badzra shar'i re ;

T02D1510:307b-32: ha sa ha sa b'i re /

T02D1510:307b-41: gra sa gra sa h'um h'um phat b'i ra dve te /
T02D1510:307b-43: ma h'a pa shu mo ha ni /
T02D1510:307b-44: ma h'a yo gi shva ri tvam d'a ki n'i banda ni sarba lo k'a ni /
T02D1510:307b-45: sadya pra tya ya k'a ri ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D1510:307b-47: ma h'a bhi re pa ra ma siddhe /
T02D1510:307b-52: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje pag mo'i phreng ba'i sngags so //
T02D1510:307b-53: bla ma rnams kyi brgyud ba'i lo rgyus ni //
T02D1510:307b-54: phyi dang nang gi rig pa thams cad la sbyangs
T02D1510:307b-55: ba'i thugs rgyud dang ldan pa dpal dpe med 'tsho
T02D1510:307b-56: zhes bya ba des mi dmigs pa de kho na
T02D1510:307b-57: nyid kyi gdams ngag bsgoms shing lo bcu gnyis su
T02D1510:307b-58: khar sa pa ni rtsa 'dab la sogs pa ji
T02D1510:307b-59: ltar gnas pa shes te bzhugs pas de las kyang
T02D1510:307b-60: khyad par gyi rtog pa ma byung nas shin tu
T02D1510:307b-61: thugs mug par gyur nas mnal bar gyur pa la
T02D1510:307b-62: rdo rje rnal 'byor mas bka' bsgo ba bu bi
T02D1510:307b-63: kra ma bu rar song shig / der khyod kyis
T02D1510:307b-64: khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan nas
T02D1510:307b-65: des kyang de'i bka' spyi bos blangs te /
T02D1510:307b-66: de'i dus kyi slob ma phyi bzhin 'brang ba tshong
T02D1510:307b-67: dpon gyi bu pandi ta chen po dpal 'dzin dang
T02D1510:307b-68: gnyis bi kra ma pu rar gshegs so //
T02D1510:307b-69: der yang dus mchod chen po zhig gi tshe mtshan mo phyed kyi dus su /
T02D1510:307b-70: bcom ldan 'das a'a ba dh'u t'i cig gi cha
T02D1510:307b-71: byad du mdzad nas bu de kho na nyid 'di
T02D1510:307b-72: yin zhes mngon sum du gdams so //
T02D1510:308a-1: thob pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa gyur pa dang /
T02D1510:308a-2: de'i tshe kho nar bcom ldan 'das mi snang bar gyur to //
T02D1510:308a-3: de'i bar du mtshan mo 'das nas des kyang ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
T02D1510:308a-4: dpal ldan bla ma thugs rje chen po mchog gi
T02D1510:308a-5: bdag nyid chen po des snod dang ldan par dgongs
T02D1510:308a-6: nas rang gis rtogs pa de pandi ta chen po
T02D1510:308a-8: skyon med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yon tan
T02D1510:308a-9: rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi dpal bla ma de
T02D1510:308a-10: las pandi ta chen po chos kyi 'byung gnas zhi
T02D1510:308a-11: bas zhus so // de la yang grags pa'i lhas zhus /
T02D1510:308a-12: de la pandi ta chen po chos 'phags kyis zhus /
T02D1510:308a-13: de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bdag gis
T02D1510:308a-14: zhus nas rang gi dran pa gso ba'i phyir cung
T02D1510:308a-15: zad bris so // nyan thos phyi rol yod par smra //
T02D1510:308a-16: rnal 'byor spyod bas sems rang bzhin //
T02D1510:308a-17: 'gro ba stong pa dbu ma bas //
T02D1510:308a-18: gsang sngags pa yang 'od gsal bzhed //
T02D1510:308a-19: kha cig yul rnams spangs nas te //
T02D1510:308a-20: 'ga' zhig yul rnams dgag byas pa //
T02D1510:308a-21: kha cig yul rnams nyid kho nas //
T02D1510:308a-22: mi yi khyu mchog byang chub sgrub //
T02D1510:308a-23: rtog pa nyams pas blo nyes 'gyur //
T02D1510:308a-24: blo ngan 'di ltar rtog par byed //
T02D1510:308a-25: blo ldan 'di nyid kho na yis //
T02D1510:308a-26: nam mkha' bas lhag ci yang 'char //
T02D1510:308a-27: zhes dpal sa ra ha pas gsungs so //
T02D1510:308a-28: ji ltar khyim thab mo ni skyes bu 'phyon ma la /
T02D1510:308a-29: rjes su chags gyur rang gi khyo la'ang chags pa ltar byed pa //
T02D1510:308a-30: de bzhin rnal 'byor rtogs pa'i yul la chags pa yis //
T02D1510:308a-31: slar yang yul la longs ni spyod par byed pa'o //
T02D1510:308a-32: grogs ngan nang nas rnal 'byor gang //
T02D1510:308a-33: bstan pa bsrung phyir 'jigs pa yis //
T02D1510:308a-34: bzang po'i spyod pa brtsam bya'i phyir //
T02D1510:308a-35: de ni sems kyi rnal 'byor rtsom //
T02D1510:308a-36: rnyog bcas yid ldan las kyi phyag rgya rab spangs nas //
T02D1510:308a-37: rtog pa las byung ye shes phyag rgya ni //
T02D1510:308a-38: yang dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub ched du rgyas ba'i
T02D1510:308a-39: mchog / de skyed byed pas phyag rgya mchog de
T02D1510:308a-40: bsgom par bya // rgyud dang sgrub thabs t'i k'a las //
T02D1510:308a-41: tshig rkang re re rnyed pa gang //
T02D1510:308a-42: de rnams bsdus nas yig sna 'di //
T02D1510:308a-43: rang la phan phyin bdag gis byas //
T02D1510:308a-44: so so skye bo nyid phyir dang //
T02D1510:308b-0: rgyun chags ting @308b 'dzin med ba'i phyir //
T02D1510:308b-1: 'di la mi gsal mi dag pa //
T02D1510:308b-2: de la mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D1510:308b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje yis //
T02D1510:308b-5: byas pa'i dge ba thob pa gang //
T02D1510:308b-6: de yis skye bo rgyal gyur cig / dpal au rgyan gyi gnas chen po las byung ba /
T02D1510:308b-7: dpal bde mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa'i 'grel pa'i
T02D1510:308b-8: t'i k'a khyad par gsal byed ces bya ba pandi
T02D1510:308b-9: ta chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjes mdzad
T02D1510:308b-11: / rgya gar shar phyogs dzag ta la'i pandi ta
T02D1510:308b-12: chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras bod yul gyi dbus
